Class BaseScreen

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.mars3142.logistics.ashley.screen.BaseScreen
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Screen
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AccountingScreen, AirplaneHijackScreen, AirportScreen, BedScreen, BranchOfficeScreen, CarCrashScreen, CarDealerScreen, CarpoolScreen, ConferenceRoomScreen, ElevatorScreen, FaxScreen, FreewayScreen, GarageScreen, HarbourScreen, HumanResourceScreen, KitchenScreen, LegalDepartmentScreen, MainScreen, MainScreen, MainScreen, ManagerScreen, MapScreen, OfficeScreen, PersonalChefScreen, PoliceStopScreen, PressOfficeScreen, PrivateScreen, RadioCenterScreen, SpriterTestScreen, StationScreen, UnderConstructionScreen

extends Object
implements Screen
